name: react-boilerplate
description: Project template for React based projects containing core project dependencies package dependencies and configurations, build workflows and configurations
author: Liam Prescott

scripts.dev.compile.app: cross-env BUILD_DEV=1 && cross-env BUILD_PRERELEASE=1 && cross-env BUILD_RELEASE=0 && webpack
scripts.release.compile.app: cross-env BUILD_DEV=0 && cross-env BUILD_PRERELEASE=0 && cross-env BUILD_RELEASE=1 && webpack --config webpack.config.release.js
